mbanking.title: Mobile Banking BNI
instructions: Log in to your BNI mobile banking account and enter your user ID and password
Enter the 11-digit payment code provided by the merchant
Confirm the payment details and enter your mobile banking PIN
Take a screenshot of the confirmation screen or save the payment notification for your records.
instructions_id: Login ke rekening mobile banking BNI Anda dan masukkan user ID dan password Anda
Masukkan kode pembayaran 11 digit yang diberikan oleh merchant
Konfirmasi detail pembayaran dan masukkan PIN mobile banking Anda
Ambil tangkapan layar layar konfirmasi atau simpan notifikasi pembayaran untuk catatan Anda.

transfer.title: ATM BNI
instructions: Log in to your BNI mobile/Internet banking account and enter your user ID and password
Enter the recipient’s account number and the payment amount
Verify the recipient’s details and the payment amount
Enter your transaction password and confirm the payment
Take a screenshot of the confirmation screen or save the payment notification for your records.
instructions_id: Login ke rekening mobile/Internet banking BNI Anda dan masukkan user ID dan password Anda
Masukkan nomor rekening penerima dan jumlah pembayaran
Verifikasi detail penerima dan jumlah pembayaran
Masukkan password transaksi Anda dan konfirmasi pembayaran
Ambil tangkapan layar layar konfirmasi atau simpan notifikasi pembayaran untuk catatan Anda.
